fields.description: Type's enum values (available for Enum type only) as defined by the GraphQL spec (https://graphql.github.io/graphql-spec/draft/#sel-FAJbLAC9CDD_CAA2lB)

fields.name: extensions
fields.description: Extensions (custom metadata) added to the GraphQL type (for all 'named' types: Object, Interface, Union, Scalar, Enum and InputObject) (see: https://github.com/graphql/graphql-spec/issues/300#issuecomment-504734306 and below comments, and https://github.com/graphql/graphql-js/issues/1527)

fields.name: fields
fields.description: Type's fields (available for Object and Interface types only) as defined by the GraphQL spec (https://graphql.github.io/graphql-spec/draft/#sel-FAJbLAC3BBCnCA8pY)

fields.name: id
fields.description: The object's unique identifier for its type

fields.name: inputFields
fields.description: Type's input Fields (available for InputObject type only) as defined by the GraphQL spec (https://graphql.github.io/graphql-spec/draft/#sel-HAJbLAuDABCBIu9N)

fields.name: interfaces
fields.description: Type's interfaces (available for Object type only) as defined by the GraphQL spec (https://graphql.github.io/graphql-spec/draft/#sel-FAJbLACpCBCxCA7tB)

fields.name: kind
fields.description: Type's kind as defined by the GraphQL spec (https://graphql.github.io/graphql-spec/draft/#sel-FAJbLACqBBCvBAtrC)

fields.name: name
fields.description: Type's name as defined by the GraphQL spec (https://graphql.github.io/graphql-spec/draft/#sel-FAJbLACvBBCyBH6rd)

fields.name: ofType
fields.description: The type of the nested type (available for NonNull and List types only) as defined by the GraphQL spec (https://graphql.github.io/graphql-spec/draft/#sel-HAJbLA4DABCBIu9N)

fields.name: possibleTypes
fields.description: Type's possible types (available for Interface and Union types only) as defined by the GraphQL spec (https://graphql.github.io/graphql-spec/draft/#sel-FAJbLACzCBC7CA0vN)

fields.name: specifiedByURL
fields.description: A scalar specification URL (a String (in the form of a URL) for custom scalars, otherwise must be null) as defined by the GraphQL spec (https://spec.graphql.org/draft/#sel-IAJXNFA0EABABL9N)

types.name: AnyBuiltInScalar
types.description: Wildcard type representing any of GraphQL's built-in types (String, Int, Boolean, Float or ID)

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The Boolean scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

types.name: Date
types.description: Date scalar. It follows the ISO 8601 specification, with format "Y-m-d")

types.name: DateTime
types.description: DateTime scalar. It follows the ISO 8601 specification, with format "Y-m-d\TH:i:sP")

types.name: Email
types.description: Email scalar, such as leo@mysite.com

types.name: HTML
types.description:
HTML scalar, such as "

Hello world!

"

types.name: ID
types.description: The ID scalar type represents a unique identifier.

types.name: Int
types.description: The Int scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values.

types.name: JSONObject
types.description: Custom scalar representing a JSON Object of unrestricted shape

types.name: MenuLocationSelectableString
types.description: Menu Locations, with possible values: `""`.

types.name: Numeric
types.description: Wildcard type representing any of the numeric types (Int or Float)

types.name: String
types.description: The String scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences.

types.name: URL
types.description: URL scalar, such as https://mysite.com/my-fabulous-page

types.name: URLAbsolutePath
types.description: URL Absolute Path scalar, such as "/my-fabulous-page" in URL "https://mysite.com/my-fabulous-page". The absolute path starts with "/", followed by the URL relative path

types.name: Commentable
types.description: The entity can receive comments

fields.name: areCommentsOpen
fields.description: Are comments open to be added to the custom post

fields.name: commentCount
fields.description: Number of comments added to the custom post

fields.description: Custom post published date, in String format

fields.name: metaValue
fields.description: Single meta value. If the key is not allowed, it returns an error; if the key is non-existent, or the value is empty, it returns `null`; otherwise, it returns the meta value.

fields.name: metaValues
fields.description: List of meta values. If the key is not allowed, it returns an error; if the key is non-existent, or the value is empty, it returns `null`; otherwise, it returns the meta value.

types.name: CustomPostUnion
types.description: Union of 'custom post' type resolvers

directives.name: cacheControl
directives.description: HTTP caching (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7234): Cache the response by setting a Cache-Control header with a max-age value; this value is calculated as the minimum max-age value among all requested fields. If any field has max-age: 0, a corresponding 'no-store' value is sent, indicating to not cache the response

args.name: maxAge
args.description: Use a specific max-age value for the field, instead of the one configured in the directive

directives.name: disableAccess
directives.description: It disables access to the field

directives.name: disableAccessForDirectives
directives.description: It disables access to the field

directives.name: include
directives.description: Include the field value in the output only if the argument 'if' evals to `true`

args.name: if
args.description: Argument that must evaluate to `true` to include the field value in the output

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Include the field value in the output only if the argument 'if' evals to `false`

args.name: if
args.description: Argument that must evaluate to `false` to include the field value in the output

args.name: roles
